Sentencas: The structural, thermal, and electrical characteristics of calcium-and cobalt-doped yttrium chromites were studied for potential use as interconnect material in high temperature solid oxide fuel cells as well as other high temperature electrochemical and thermoelectric devices.
Titulo: Calcium- and Cobalt-Doped Yttrium Chromites as an Interconnect Material for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The Y0.8Ca0.2Cr1-xCoxO3 +/-delta (x = 0, 0.1, 0.2, 0.3) compositions formed single-phase orthorhombic perovskite structures in a wide range of oxygen pressures.
Titulo: Calcium- and Cobalt-Doped Yttrium Chromites as an Interconnect Material for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Sintering behavior was remarkably enhanced as a result of cobalt substitution for chromium, and densities 95 and 97% of theoretical density were obtained after sintering at 1300 degrees C in air, when x was 0.2 and 0.3, respectively.
Titulo: Calcium- and Cobalt-Doped Yttrium Chromites as an Interconnect Material for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The electrical conductivity in both oxidizing and reducing atmospheres was significantly improved with cobalt additions, and was 49 and 10 S/cm at 850 degrees C and 55 and 14 S/cm at 950 degrees C in air and forming gas, respectively, for x = 0.2.
Titulo: Calcium- and Cobalt-Doped Yttrium Chromites as an Interconnect Material for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The conductivity increase upon cobalt substitution for chromium was attributed to the charge carrier density increase as confirmed by Seebeck measurements.
Titulo: Calcium- and Cobalt-Doped Yttrium Chromites as an Interconnect Material for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The thermal expansion coefficient was increased with cobalt content and closely matched to that of an 8 mol % yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) electrolyte for 0.1 <= x <= 0.2.
Titulo: Calcium- and Cobalt-Doped Yttrium Chromites as an Interconnect Material for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: For x <= 0.2, Y0.8Ca0.2Cr1-xCoxO3 +/-delta and YSZ were found to be chemically compatible for firing temperatures to at least 1400 degrees C. (C) 2010 The Electrochemical Society.
Titulo: Calcium- and Cobalt-Doped Yttrium Chromites as an Interconnect Material for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
Calcium- and Cobalt-Doped Yttrium Chromites as an Interconnect Material for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
Calcium- and Cobalt-Doped Yttrium Chromites as an Interconnect Material for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
